title: Turkey Cenbank Will Expand Key Bond Portfolio for ‘Flexibility’
description: Turkey’s central bank will boost government bond purchases next year to strengthen a key portfolio that’s used in managing lira liquidity.
content: Turkey’s central bank will boost government bond purchases next year to strengthen a key portfolio that’s used in managing lira liquidity.
